descriptionHTML:
Ambient light sensor for automatic adjustment feature support.
Sets the minimum auto brightness to avoid dark screens in low-light.

Smart Brightness automatically switch from auto brightness to manual using a custom configuration. In low-light the Smart Brightness change the brightness from auto to manual mode and set the screen brightness to the minimum brightness making it easy to read the clock.

Smart Brightness has been tested with the minimum brightness at 10% and auto brightness on. The results are a better experience in low-light.

Key Words:
Moto 360
Screen Brightness
Auto Brightness
Ambient Light
Wear Brightness
Android Wear
comments: Perfect Display Just Finicky This is just what I needed. Its perfect.  I just wish I would have found it when I bought my watch. It is just very finicky
Automatic brightness doesn't seem to work on my 360

High battery consumption! So, I've been testing this app for the past few days and while it definitely works as stated, it also seems to kill my Moto 360's battery! I've tested it: one day installed, one day uninstalled, one day installed, and so on, then compared battery stats. Without this app installed my battery drop can be as low as 1.5% per-hour, with it installed it can be as high as 8.12%! It's a shame as it does seem to fix the dodgy stock auto-brightness. Has the potential to be a great app!
